Text:
I'm working to lower the prices Arizonans pay at the pump.
https://t.co/u2kB4cqEIt

I have supported and will continue to support providing Ukraine with weapons and equipment to defend themselves against further Russian invasion, and will keep working with my colleagues and this administration to defend Ukrainian sovereignty.

We must show resolve in supporting Ukraine's freedom.
 
The time is now for the United States, alongside our allies, to implement significant sanctions against Putin, his backers, and the Russian government for this incursion.

When U.S. companies have to halt or cut back their operations because they’re relying on microchips manufactured overseas, that’s a problem.
 
The plan I secured in the Senate will help us make more microchips on American soil, especially here in Arizona.

As a dedicated Navy veteran and state legislator, Senator David Bradley leaves behind a powerful legacy of service to our country, our state, and our Tucson community. My thoughts and condolences are with his loved ones. https://t.co/rXXIdOQhIc

If you're around the Valley, check out these new murals in downtown Phoenix for #BlackHistoryMonth.  
https://t.co/fCvMrbGFPI

El primer cheque del Seguro Social se emitió hace 82 años. Por muchas décadas, el programa a sido un salvavidas para los arizonenses jubilados.
 
Siempre lucharé para proteger el Seguro Social para que nuestros adultos mayores reciban los beneficios que se han ganado.

Expanding our electric vehicle charging network means cleaner travel and new good-paying jobs. 

Our bipartisan infrastructure law is helping us rebuild and grow Arizona’s economy.
https://t.co/OX6B24OLdM

Leaders across the state recognize that our plan to boost microchip manufacturing will create high-paying Arizona jobs, strengthen supply chains to lower costs, and bolster national security.        
https://t.co/yGNGIjdzw0

Gasoline has become too expensive. Prices at the pump are up 40% over the last year.
 
I'm proposing we eliminate the federal gas tax for the rest of the year to help working families get back on their feet.

Arizona is feeling the impacts of the western drought.

The water and wildfire response resources that I secured in the bipartisan infrastructure law will help us get through it.
https://t.co/o72GEx8AQa

Exposure to pollution from abandoned oil and gas well sites poses a serious public health risk. Thanks to our bipartisan infrastructure law, we’re going to get these hazardous sites cleaned up.
https://t.co/INsuveWVQc

My plan to boost domestic microchip manufacturing will grow Arizona as a global hub of this key industry for decades to come. 
https://t.co/LWKBoYJXGH

I've been spending a lot of time working to ease the bottlenecks in our supply chains.
 
This is how we'll bring down rising costs.
https://t.co/NIIFD0KbFF

Este #BlackHistoryMonth, es importante tomar el tiempo para reconocer que la historia afroamericana es la historia del pais. Hay que reconocer las formas en que los afroamericanos han impulsado a Arizona y a nuestra nación al honrar sus contribuciones y elevar sus historias.

Large majorities of Republicans, Democrats, and Independents are all on board with banning stock trading by members of Congress.
 
The coalition to get this done is only growing stronger with each passing day.

Families are struggling with the high costs of gas, groceries, and so much more. One way we can provide relief is by getting rid of the federal gas tax for the rest of the year.
 
My new bill will lower gas prices for Arizonans and keep more money in their pockets. https://t.co/LHR6qTiA5k

In the wrong hands, drone technology can pose serious security risks.
 
Our bill helps give law enforcement more tools to keep our communities safe and our borders secure against criminal organizations.
https://t.co/DaDi93Gcpg

¿Sabes por qué han subido los precios de los carros? La escasez de microchips es parte del problema.
 
Aseguré un plan de $52 mil millones en el Senado para reforzar la cadena de suministro de microchips y reducir su costo.
 
Tenemos que convertirlo en ley lo antes posible.
I have a new bill to lower the price you pay at the gas pump. https://t.co/EeJhCfzc1Z
Let's talk about microchips. https://t.co/DM22cHHqOZ

Arizona was admitted to the Union on February 14, 1912 — officially becoming #State48.
 
Happy birthday to the Grand Canyon State. https://t.co/5w5qaOhvj3

Saddened there was another shooting this past week that injured a brave law enforcement officer in Arizona. My thoughts are with the Yavapai-Apache community and I'm wishing Sgt. Preston Brogdon well in his recovery.
https://t.co/V7jom29ymp
Who's ready to ban members of Congress from trading stocks?

During this pandemic, some students have had to rely on hotspots at libraries or coffee shops just to get their homework done.
 
This shouldn't be happening.
 
Our bipartisan infrastructure law is expanding high-speed internet access to the communities that need it.

I've been working to bolster supply chains by strengthening our infrastructure, investing in microchip manufacturing, and addressing workforce shortages.
 
Keeping goods flowing at the Port of Tucson is part of how we'll lower costs for Arizona families. https://t.co/mFr8UWFi3Y

Congratulations to Shelly Lowe, who grew up on the Navajo Nation, on her historic confirmation as the first Native American to lead @NEHgov.
https://t.co/cbs4wcpFzZ

Acabo de presentar un nuevo proyecto de ley para eliminar el impuesto federal sobre la gasolina hasta fin de año. 

Esto significa precios de gasolina más bajos y más dinero en su bolsillo.

Spent some time with the @THispanicChmbr's leadership team in Tucson last week. Their partnership is critical as we work to support Arizona's small businesses, strengthen supply chains, and get our economy back on track. https://t.co/q8XwQmo8lv
This is an important workplace reform that'll protect Arizona workers. https://t.co/R1G0ozMdcw

Members of law enforcement put themselves at great risk every day and night to keep our communities safe. I am keeping the @PhoenixPolice officers who were injured early this morning, their families, and colleagues in my thoughts and hoping for their recovery. https://t.co/kPdXHreuvL

As we come out of this pandemic, we not only have to rebuild the economy, but also create the jobs of the future.

https://t.co/SPDV9VV6ay

Members of Congress shouldn't be buying and selling stocks of the companies they're in charge of regulating.
 
It's as simple as that.

Nuestro proyecto de ley bajará estos precios y eliminará el impuesto federal de la gasolina hasta fin de año.
https://t.co/IN9Em6K1O0

I just introduced a new bill to get rid of the federal gas tax through the end of the year. 

That would mean lower prices at the pump and more money in your pocket.

As a combat veteran, I've seen firsthand how much Gold Star families sacrifice in support of our national security.
 
Our bipartisan bill would create an official holiday honoring Gold Star families in Arizona and across the country.
https://t.co/QTtZy4nwt8

Arizonans are paying some of the highest prices for gas we've seen in years. It’s putting a strain on families when they fill up the tank.
 
Our bill will lower gas prices by getting rid of the federal gas tax through the end of the year. https://t.co/vc2e0yLuWS

Now we’ve delivered the funding to get this done.
https://t.co/UWibrWGgjC

Our plan to boost domestic microchip manufacturing will create thousands of high-paying jobs, lower costs, and reduce our reliance on adversaries like China.
 
I'll keep working with both Republicans and Democrats to get this across the finish line as soon as possible. https://t.co/hdLKn0ER7x

Our bipartisan infrastructure law is going to kickstart critical waterway projects across Arizona that keep our communities safe from flooding and support continued growth.      
https://t.co/HdB6j4lVo9

Black scientists have made remarkable contributions to our nation's space program and beyond. I encourage everyone to take some time this #BlackHistoryMonth to learn more about these trailblazing leaders. https://t.co/NtQfOJx6Mj

This is going to help strengthen supply chains and bring down costs for Arizonans.
https://t.co/CtFVVEwpLs

https://t.co/MEisJJaovw

https://t.co/FKBNa20iJR
Our bipartisan infrastructure law is finally going to deliver on safer roads, high-speed internet, and clean water for tribal communities that have been failed by Washington for generations.

Aquí en el desierto, el agua es nuestro recurso más preciado. La ley de infraestructura bipartidista que ayudé aprobar mejorará los sistemas de agua del oeste y mejorará el acceso al agua limpia en Arizona. https://t.co/hzxNMn4M9l
I extend my condolences to Judge Rosa Mroz's loved ones. Saddened to hear this tragic news. We are keeping her family in our thoughts. https://t.co/hgM3xJBEP0

The push to ban members of Congress from trading stocks is only getting stronger.
 
Let's get this done.
https://t.co/2WiHLRD6U8

The very first Social Security check was issued 82 years ago. After all these decades, the program remains a vital lifeline for retired Arizonans.
 
I'll always fight to protect Social Security and make sure our seniors receive the benefits they've earned.

Los trabajadores, empleadores y sindicatos ahora pueden presentar cargos por prácticas laborales injustas y peticiones para elecciones sindicales a @NLRBes en línea en español. Para obtener más información en español, visite https://t.co/BAhsTNVdvm.

In just the past few weeks, we've announced huge new investments in Arizona's roads, bridges, airports, water systems, and wildfire response. And there's still much more to come.
 
None of this would be possible without our bipartisan infrastructure law.

America, and the world, are a safer place today. Our national security is strengthened now that this ISIS leader has been killed.

Grateful for the U.S. special operations forces who executed a dangerous mission with bravery and skill. https://t.co/G58CxSiCiY

Ponte la vacuna y la dosis de refuerzo.
 
Así es como saldremos de esta pandemia.

We're taking meaningful steps towards securing a sustainable water future for our state.
 
Arizona will now be better prepared for drought because of our bipartisan infrastructure law.
https://t.co/nMq39hGYJW

Eager to get our $52 billion deal to boost domestic microchip manufacturing across the finish line. 
https://t.co/Ym3htdI0an

I introduced a bill with @SenOssoff that would ban members of Congress from trading stocks.
 
The penalty for anyone who violates the ban? A fine in the amount of their entire Congressional salary.
 
We're serious about ending corrupt insider trading.
I'm wishing my friend and colleague @SenatorLujan a full and speedy recovery. https://t.co/77zf0idQsr

It was 19 years ago today that I heard the terrible news: Space Shuttle Columbia had been lost during re-entry.

I knew the seven crew members. Three of them were my astronaut classmates. They were brave explorers, tireless public servants, and above all, really good people. https://t.co/gSuh6y4AvO

After Rollonda Daugherty from Glendale had her Medicare wrongfully terminated, my office stepped in and got her coverage reinstated.
 
We're always here to help Arizonans who need assistance with the federal government. Reach out anytime at https://t.co/X0DRH7ywm2. https://t.co/0I8O8vIzE1
Wishing all who celebrate in Arizona and around the country a happy #YearOfTheTiger! https://t.co/zSaIRamyFc

https://t.co/MkwnyjqSUN

As we begin #BlackHistoryMonth, it’s important that we take time to recognize Black history is America’s history. Let’s recognize the many ways Black Americans have pushed Arizona and our nation forward by honoring their contributions and uplifting their stories.

La ley de infraestructura bipartidista que ayudé aprobar mejorará el Puerto de Entrada de San Luis, que requiere reparaciones y actualizaciones importantes. Nuestro proyecto de ley también da acceso al agua limpia necesaria para vivir y prosperar. https://t.co/9bGYEi3ZCF

Want to know why car prices have skyrocketed? The global microchip shortage is a big part of it.
 
I secured a $52 billion deal in the Senate to bolster microchip supply chains and bring these costs down.
 
Now we need to get it over the finish line and signed into law ASAP.

Prices have gone up for gasoline, beef, milk, eggs, and nearly everything else. I've been working to address our labor shortages and take on corporate price gouging so we can get supply chains moving again and lower costs for Arizona families.
https://t.co/oZy4rY5Br4

The bipartisan infrastructure law is going to fix Arizona's bridges.

If we're going to clean up Washington, then stock trading by members of Congress must end.

Our health care providers are stretched thin and this funding I recently announced will help them continue to care for Arizonans while battling this pandemic.
https://t.co/ThstFa4mlN

We need to rebuild our economy, but also reinvent it for the 21st century. It's so important that we invest in career and technical education programs, like those offered at @PimaJTED, to provide Arizonans with the skills they'll need for the high-paying jobs of the future. https://t.co/mLO2A4Gjr9

Valley fever continues to pose a health risk to Arizonans and many across the southwest. Our legislation ensures we support and invest in the tools needed to tackle Valley fever head-on.

https://t.co/Fy0WZq0jiI

Congratulations to Chandler's Ella Wang on representing Arizona as one of the finalists. Eager to see what Ella and this talented group of rising STEM leaders achieve in the years ahead! https://t.co/jVoecOtik1

These seven brave explorers lost their lives when the Space Shuttle Challenger exploded right after takeoff. Today, on the 36th anniversary of this national tragedy, we're thinking of their families and loved ones. https://t.co/oLCUHXb5WC

More great news that further cements Arizona's place as a global hub for microchip production.
 
My efforts in the Senate to strengthen semiconductor supply chains will help continue the flow of new investment and high-paying jobs into our state.
https://t.co/CBRJZcV453

Today, we remember the crew of Apollo 1. It was on this day in 1967 that Gus Grissom, Ed White, and Roger B. Chaffee lost their lives when a cabin fire broke out during a launch test. 
 
These pioneers made significant contributions to our nation's space program. https://t.co/8D593Ti0iz

I take seriously the responsibility of evaluating nominees for lifetime appointments, and look forward to meeting with whomever the President puts forward to fill this vacancy. I'll evaluate the nominee based on their qualifications and commitment to uphold the Constitution.

I wish Justice Stephen Breyer well in his retirement. Justice Breyer has long understood the impact of the Supreme Court on the lives of Americans. He leaves behind a legacy of upholding the Constitution as well as health care protections, free speech, and reproductive rights.

More than six million Jews were murdered in the Holocaust, one of the darkest and most horrific periods in human history. We can never, ever go back.
 
On this #HolocaustRemembranceDay, we stand firmly against antisemitism and hatred in all its forms. #NeverAgain

Workforce shortages in the trucking industry are one of the reasons we've seen higher food prices and fewer options on store shelves.
 
The administration is now taking steps I've recommended to safely get more truck drivers on the road.
https://t.co/RZI7IuiIGw
I know I speak for many Arizonans when I say we're all pulling for @PhoenixPolice officer Tyler Moldovan. Wishing him continued progress in his recovery. https://t.co/FCuyFbp947

From expanded broadband on the Navajo Nation and stronger wildfire mitigation in Flagstaff to improved public transit in Tucson and a modernized port of entry in San Luis, the benefits of the bipartisan infrastructure law will touch every part of our state.

Corporate PACs have a corrupting influence on our political system.
 
Let's ban them.
https://t.co/ex3aDA6VZg

Since the Senate passed my $52 billion plan to boost microchip manufacturing back in June, the chip shortage has only gotten worse. The release of the House's bill is a critical step forward. I’ll keep working to get this over the finish line.
https://t.co/G2pBruo7Zs

It goes without saying that this pandemic hit a lot of Arizona's small businesses hard. The Community Navigator Program I championed in the #AmericanRescuePlan will help make sure they can access the relief they need to stay open and save local jobs.

I'll always look out for Arizona's seniors.

My bipartisan bill will strengthen America’s position as a global leader in technology by reducing our reliance on adversaries like China.
https://t.co/wwZRQcqOvK

Members of Congress should be banned from trading stocks.

Get vaccinated and boosted.

It's how we'll get through this.

Whatever label you want to put on me, I came here to get things done.
 
That's what I'm doing and that's what I'll continue to do.
https://t.co/nwwoTwuChB

If you can, please donate blood. There's an urgent shortage facing the nation.      
https://t.co/kjAuB80mPo

For almost 50 years, Roe v. Wade has guaranteed abortion access — and that can't change now.
 
I've co-sponsored the Women's Health Protection Act because we need to codify reproductive rights into law.
Head over to https://t.co/CftaqaUl2m if you haven't already and order your free at-home COVID-19 tests.

It was the #CitizensUnited decision that opened the floodgates for unlimited corporate money to pour into our political system.
 
My new bill to ban corporate PACs is one way we can fight back against the influence of powerful special interests. https://t.co/NB57MYjRDX

I've partnered with @SenOssoff on a bill that'll prevent members of Congress from buying and selling stocks.
 
Let's end corrupt insider trading once and for all.

If NASA functioned like the United States Senate, they would never get the rocket off the launchpad.

Rev. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s pursuit of equality for all was his life's work and guides us to this day. As we remember Dr. King’s extraordinary legacy of service and commitment to justice, let us continue his work by seeking out ways to serve within our own communities. #MLKDay

Western states are facing historic wildfires. I partnered with @SenatorRomney to create this commission to improve the way we prevent and respond to wildfires.
https://t.co/ZW5eLQdxmN

It's a relief to hear that those held at Congregation Beth Israel in Colleyville have been safely rescued. Grateful for the members of law enforcement who helped bring this dangerous situation to a close.

We must always stand together in condemning acts of anti-Semitic hate.

https://t.co/IQuOWE3VvB

It's time to put an end to corrupt insider trading and ensure that leaders in Congress focus on delivering results for their constituents, not their stock portfolios.

https://t.co/ykAGxifZk1

President Teddy Roosevelt officially declared the Grand Canyon as a national monument on this day back in 1908. All these years later, it remains our state's greatest treasure.
 
We need to continue protecting the Grand Canyon for generations to come. https://t.co/FMsYLGMOtc

La semana pasada, le di la bienvenida a @SBAIsabel a Arizona. Visitamos pequeños negocios locales, como Moreno's Mexican Grill, para hablar de cómo el Programa de Navegador Comunitario que yo promoví ayudará a los negocios latinos a obtener recursos para mantenerse abiertos. https://t.co/prqFErcz6K

Clean water. High-speed internet. Safe roads and bridges.
 
The bipartisan infrastructure law is delivering these priorities to communities that have needed them for far too long.

Thank you to our health care workers. We can't say it enough. They are heroes who put themselves at risk on a daily basis to serve their patients.
 
Let's be grateful for everything they're doing to help us get through this pandemic.

Our bipartisan infrastructure law looks out for Arizona's rural communities. 
https://t.co/NaQTZFmOS7

Arizona is the place to be in 2022. 
https://t.co/Vbi6jEdE6Q

Eleven years after January 8th, 2011, @GabbyGiffords and I are so grateful for the resilience and support of the Tucson community. And I am so proud of the strength and bravery she shows in her recovery. Today, we remember those we lost and appreciate the community we have. https://t.co/SLC65EaCrI

I took these concerns to Washington and championed the Community Navigator Program in the #AmericanRescuePlan, which will help these businesses get relief. By meeting small business owners where they are, the program will save Arizonans jobs and keep local businesses open.

Since day one, it's been my top priority to get Arizona the resources we need to beat this virus and rebuild our economy. As I travel across the state, I hear from small business owners in Latino and rural communities about how challenging it’s been to get the help they need.

The Community Navigator Program at @SBAgov will help our small businesses cut through red tape to keep their doors open. I'm grateful that @SBAIsabel came out to Arizona today. We started the day by visiting Moreno's Mexican Grill, a Latino-owned small business in Mesa. https://t.co/jt7aHN0qYU

Arizona is already a leader in microchips — and I secured and passed a $52 billion deal that will grow the industry further and bring thousands of high-paying jobs to our state. https://t.co/IIQDoPNJow

I'm eager to continue working with the @AZChamber and our state's business community to create high paying jobs, get workers the skills they need and grow our economy. Together, we will ensure that Arizona remains the best place to live, work, start a business and raise a family. https://t.co/PhcCiK9Xsc

Health care costs too much. A big reason why is that too many families have received unexpected out-of-network medical bills after receiving care.
 
This new law protects Arizonans from being burdened with costly surprise medical bills. https://t.co/09UBOlWqef

As the son of two police officers, I'm grateful for the bravery of @CapitolPolice and law enforcement on January 6th and since. While investigations continue to hold lawbreakers accountable, we must stand up for democracy and bring Americans together behind our shared values.

The deadly insurrection a year ago on January 6th was an attack on our democracy and a dark day in our country’s history.
 
Despite this unpatriotic attempt to silence the voices of Arizona voters, democracy prevailed.

Thanks to our bipartisan infrastructure law, expanded high-speed internet access is coming to Rim Country.
https://t.co/cB9KdCvMAn

In Arizona, our bipartisan infrastructure law will upgrade the major freeways, interstates, and bridges we all use every day — making them safer and less congested.
 
It's also going to create good-paying jobs. Thousands of them.
https://t.co/tGyiK1xcHi
Con la variante Omicron en el estado, aquí hay información importante sobre las vacunas y pruebas de COVID-19 y cómo podemos mantenernos seguros en Arizona. https://t.co/yTLDbSNSRm

https://t.co/uhA3IkxfCy

https://t.co/SH1sd7X3B5
¡Feliz año nuevo, Arizona! @GabbyGiffords y yo les deseamos a usted y a su familia un próspero 2022, lleno de salud y alegría.
Happy New Year, Arizona! @GabbyGiffords and I wish you and your family a healthy and joyful 2022.

As Chair of the Emerging Threats and Capabilities Subcommittee, I'm focused on making sure our military maintains its competitive edge over adversaries like China.

@UArizona's leadership in hypersonics research will play an important role in this mission. https://t.co/kCV0sD45we

It can be worrying to once again see headlines about COVID-19 case numbers increasing and hospitals overwhelmed. There’s something you can do.
 
Get the vaccine, and the booster when you’re eligible.

Arizonans sent me to Washington to be a problem-solver who delivers results for our state. That's exactly what I've done during my first year in office.
